item.title: ‘I’m not looking to leave any money to the kids’: We’re in our 60s with $1.5 million in IRAs. Can we retire next year?
My husband and I are splitting our estate between his child and my three children. Should they get equal shares?
item.description: “We try to help all our kids when we can, yet push for self-sufficiency.”

item.title: I’m only 54 and my 401(k) plan is emailing me about buying annuities. Is this something I should do?
item.description: Options will keep coming, but signing up for an annuity is something you want to carefully consider
